elementSpec.desc: contains a description of a single identifiable manuscript.
包含單一份可識別手稿的描述。
describes the system used to ensure correct ordering of the quires making up a codex or incunable, typically by means of annotations at the foot of the page.
描述一疊書頁裝訂成手抄本或書冊時，確保書頁順序無誤的方法，通常是利用頁腳的註記。
contains any kind of dimensional specification.
尺寸的詳細說明。

attDef.desc: indicates which aspect of the object is being measured.
指出物件被測量的部分。

valItem.gloss: dimensions relate to one or more leaves (e.g. a single leaf, a gathering, or a separately bound part)
一張或多張頁面的尺寸大小 (例如單一頁面、聚集頁面、或分開裝訂的部份)
dimensions relate to the area of a leaf which has been ruled in preparation for writing.
頁面上劃好線以備書寫的範圍大小。
dimensions relate to the area of a leaf which has been pricked out in preparation for ruling (used where this differs significantly from the ruled area, or where the ruling is not measurable).
頁面上刺好記號以備劃線的範圍大小 (用在和畫線範圍不同的位置，或是畫線無法測量的位置) 。

dimensions relate to the area of a leaf which has been written, with the height measured from the top of the minims on the top line of writing, to the bottom of the minims on the bottom line of writing.
頁面上已書寫文字的範圍大小，高度由最頂行文字的頂端測量至最底行文字的底端。
dimensions relate to the miniatures within the manuscript
手稿中圖畫的尺寸大小
dimensions relate to the binding in which the codex or manuscript is contained
手抄本或手稿裝訂的尺寸大小
dimensions relate to the box or other container in which the manuscript is stored.
手稿所儲存的箱子或其他容器的尺寸大小

elementSpec.desc: contains a measurement measured along the axis parallel to the spine.
沿著與書脊平行的軸線所量出的測量值。
contains a measurement measured across the spine.
橫跨書脊的測量值。
contains a measurement measured along the axis perpendicular to the spine.
沿著與書脊垂直的軸線所量出的測量值
contains a heraldic formula or phrase, typically found as part of a blazon, coat of arms, etc.
包含一個紋章學的常規或詞彙，通常是裝飾、或盾形紋章等的一部分。
defines a location within a manuscript or manuscript part, usually as a (possibly discontinuous) sequence of folio references.
定義一個手稿或手稿部分裡的位置，通常是用一系列的 (可能不連續的) 頁面參照。

attDef.desc: identifies the foliation scheme in terms of which the location is being specified.
說明所指出位置的編頁架構。
attDef.valDesc: A pointer to some foliation element which defines the foliation scheme used, or an external link to some equivalent resource.
一個連結到元素foliation的指標，該元素定義所使用的編頁架構，或定義一個同等資源的外部連結。

attDef.desc: specifies the starting point of the location in a normalized form.
用正規格式指明該位置的起始點。
attDef.valDesc: typically this will be a page number
通常是一個頁碼

attDef.desc: specifies the end-point of the location in a normalized form.
用正規格式指明該位置的結束點。
attDef.valDesc: typically this will be a page number
常是一個頁碼

attDef.desc: supplies a link to one or more page images or transcriptions of the specified range of folios.
提供一個連結指向一個或多個頁面圖像，或是頁面指定範圍的轉錄。

elementSpec.desc: contains a word or phrase describing the material of which a manuscript (or part of a manuscript) is composed.
用一個字詞描述手稿 (或手稿部分) 的組成材料。
contains any form of date, used to identify the date of origin for a manuscript or manuscript part.
包含任何格式的日期，用以確認手稿或手稿部分的來源日期。
contains any form of place name, used to identify the place of origin for a manuscript or manuscript part.
包含任何格式的地名，用以確認手稿或手稿部分的來源地點。
The word or words taken from a fixed point in a codex (typically the beginning of the second leaf) in order to provide a unique identifier for it.
從手抄本中固定位置所拿開的一個或多個字 (通常在第二張書頁的開頭) ，目的是提供一個專有的識別符號。
contains discussion of the leaf or quire signatures found within a codex.
包含手抄本中一張或一疊書頁內簽名的敘述。
contains a word or phrase describing a stamp or similar device.
包含一個字詞，描述一個印記或是類似圖案。
contains a word or phrase describing a watermark or similar device.
包含一個字詞，描述一個浮水印或是類似圖案。
contains the information required to identify the manuscript being described.
包含識別敘述中的手稿所需要的資訊。
contains the name of an organization such as a university or library, with which a manuscript is identified, generally its holding institution.
包含一個組織名稱，例如大學或圖書館，手稿屬於該組織，通常是手稿所在地。
contains the name of a repository within which manuscripts are stored, possibly forming part of an institution.
包含該手稿收藏所在地的名稱，可能是某機構的一部分。
contains the name of a collection of manuscripts, not necessarily located within a single repository.
包含手稿集合的名稱，手稿未必皆位於單一收藏點。
contains an alternative or former structured identifier used for a manuscript, such as a former catalogue number.
包含手稿中的一個替換或先前使用的識別符碼，例如先前的分類碼。
contains any form of unstructured alternative name used for a manuscript, such as an ocellus nominum, or nickname.
包含手稿無特定結構的任何形式替換名稱，像是ocellus nominum或是暱稱。
contains the colophon of a manuscript item: that is, a statement providing information regarding the date, place, agency, or reason for production of the manuscript.
包含一個手稿項目的 版權頁標記：即提供日期、地點、代理機構、或手稿產生原因等資訊的聲明。
contains the explicit of a manuscript item, that is, the closing words of the text proper, exclusive of any rubric or colophon which might follow it.
包含手稿項目中的 結尾語，即文本完成時的結尾語，不包含可能出現在其後的按語或版權頁標記。
contains information concerning the manuscript's filiation, i.e. its relationship to other surviving manuscripts of the same text, its protographs, antigraphs and apographs.
包含手稿的來歷相關資訊，例如該手稿和其他相同文字內容的現存手稿之間的關係、以及該手稿的原稿、 抄本、以及謄本。

contains the string of words that denotes the end of a text division, often with an assertion as to its author and title, usually set off from the text itself by red ink, by a different size or type of script, or by some other such visual device.
包含表示該文字區段結尾的字串，常有作者及標題的聲明，通常使用紅墨水、不同的字型與大小、或用其他不同視覺效果的圖案，來與文件本身作區別。

contains the incipit of a manuscript item, that is the opening words of the text proper, exclusive of any rubric which might precede it, of sufficient length to identify the work uniquely; such incipts were, in fomer times, frequently used a means of reference to a work, in place of a title.
包含手稿項目中的起始語，即文本開端的起始語，不包括可能出現在之前的按語，並以充分的文字來獨家識別該作品；早期，這種起始語常用為作品的參照工具，出現在標題部份。
describes the intellectual content of a manuscript or manuscript part, either as a series of paragraphs or as a series of structured manuscript items.
描述手稿或手稿部分的智慧內容，可以是一系列的文字段落，或是一系列有組織的手稿項目。

attDef.desc: identifies the text types or classifications applicable to this object.
標明適合的文字類型或分類。
attDef.valDesc: One or more codes, each of which is used as the identifier for a text classification element supplied in the TEI Header textClass element.
一個或多個代碼，每個代碼代表一個在TEI標頭中元素textClass所提供的文件分類元素。

elementSpec.desc: describes an individual work or item within the intellectual content of a manuscript or manuscript part.
描述手稿或手稿部分的智慧內容中所包含的單一作品或項目。

attDef.desc: identifies the text types or classifications applicable to this item
標明適合的文字類型或分類。
attDef.valDesc: One or more codes, each of which is used as the identifier for a text classification element supplied in the TEI Header textClass element.
一個或多個代碼，每個代碼代表一個在TEI標頭中元素textClass所提供的文件分類元素。

elementSpec.desc: contains a structured description for an individual work or item within the intellectual content of a manuscript or manuscript part.
包含某單一作品或項目的結構性描述，該作品或項目存在於手稿或手稿部分的智慧內容中。

attDef.desc: identifies the text types or classifications applicable to this item
標明適合的文字類型或分類。
attDef.valDesc: One or more codes, each of which is used as the identifier for a text classification element supplied in the TEI Header textClass element.
一個或多個代碼，每個代碼代表一個在TEI標頭中元素textClass所提供的文件分類元素。

elementSpec.desc: contains the text of any rubric or heading attached to a particular manuscript item, that is, a string of words through which a manuscript signals the beginning of a text division, often with an assertion as to its author and title, which is in some way set off from the text itself, usually in red ink, or by use of different size or type of script, or some other such visual device.
包含任何按語的文字或是附在特殊手稿項目的標題，即手稿用來指示文字區段開始的字串，常有作者及標題的聲明，通常使用紅墨水、不同的字型與大小、或用其他不同視覺效果的圖案，來跟文件本身作區別。
contains a brief summary of the intellectual content of an item, provided by the cataloguer
包含由編目者所提供一份簡短概述，說明該項目的智慧內容。
describes the languages and writing systems used by a manuscript (as opposed to its description, which is described in the langUsage element)
描述手稿中所使用的語言和書寫系統 (相對於其描述時使用的語言使用元素) 。

attDef.desc: supplies a code which identifies the chief language used in the manuscript.
提供一代碼，識別手稿中使用的主要語言。
attDef.valDesc: a recognised language code using ISO 3066 or succesor, which may additionally be documented by a language element in the header
使用ISO 3066或其系列中的語言代碼，也可能另外在標頭中的元素language中有所紀錄

attDef.desc: one or more codes identifying any other languages used in the manuscript.
一個或多個代碼識別手稿中使用的任何其他語言。
attDef.valDesc: a list of codes, each of which is a recognised language code using RFC 3066 or succesor, which may additionally be documented by a language element in the header
一代碼列表，每個語言代碼皆定義在RFC 3066或其系列中，也可能另外在標頭中的元素language中有所紀錄

classSpec.desc: provides attributes used to describe excerpts from a manuscript placed in a description thereof
提供用來描述關於手稿摘錄的屬性

attDef.desc: indicates whether the passage being quoted is defective, i.e. incomplete through loss or damage.
指出所引用的段落是否不完全，例如因遺失或損毀而不完全。

elementSpec.desc: contains a full physical description of a manuscript or manuscript part, optionally subdivided using more specialised elements from the model.physDescPart class.
包含一個手稿或手稿部分的完整材質描述，可以利用model.physDescPart class中的專門元素選擇性地再分類。
contains a description of the physical components making up the object which is being described.
包含討論中物件的材質組成成分描述。

attDef.desc: a short project-specific name identifying the physical form of the carrier, for example as a codex, roll, fragment, partial leaf, cutting etc.
一個簡短的用途專用名稱，表示該媒介的物質外形，例如手抄本、名冊、斷片、部分頁面、剪報等。
attDef.valDesc: a short project-defined name
簡短的用途定義名稱

elementSpec.desc: groups elements describing the physical support for the written part of a manuscript.
匯集描述手稿書寫部分的物質載體元素。

attDef.desc: a short project-defined name for the material composing the majority of the support
載體主要組成材料的簡短用途定義名稱

valItem.gloss: Paper
紙
Parchment
羊皮紙
mixed
混合

elementSpec.desc: contains a description of the materials etc. which make up the physical support for the written part of a manuscript.
描述對於手稿書寫部分的物質載體所使用的材料等。
contains a description of how the leaves or bifolia are physically arranged.
描述頁面紙張的排列組成。
describes the numbering system or systems used to count the leaves or pages in a codex.
描述計算手抄本紙張頁數的一種或多種編號系統。
contains a description of the physical condition of the manuscript.
包含手稿材質狀況的描述。
collects the set of layout descriptions applicable to a manuscript.
收集一組適當的手稿外觀編排描述。
describes how text is laid out on the page, including information about any ruling, pricking, or other evidence of page-preparation techniques.
描述文字在頁面上的編排，包括任何橫隔線、刺痕、或其他的頁面準備技術的資訊。

attDef.desc: specifies the number of columns per page
說明每頁的欄數
attDef.valDesc: may be given as a pair of numbers (to indicate a range) or as a single number.
可能是一對數字 (以指明範圍) 或是單一數字。

attDef.desc: specifies the number of ruled lines per column
說明每欄的橫隔線數
attDef.valDesc: may be given as a pair of numbers (a range) or as a single number.
可能是一對數字 (範圍) 或是單一數字。

attDef.desc: specifies the number of written lines per colum
說明每欄的書寫行數
attDef.valDesc: may be given as a pair of numbers (a range), or as a single number.
可能是一對數字 (範圍) 或是單一數字。

elementSpec.desc: contains a description of all the different kinds of writing used in a manuscript.
手稿中使用的所有不同書寫種類的描述。

attDef.desc: specifies the number of distinct hands identified within the manuscript
說明在手稿中可清楚識別的書寫者人數。
attDef.valDesc: A whole number, or the string "many"
一個整數，或是字串「很多」

elementSpec.desc: describes a particular style or hand distinguished within a manuscript.
描述在手稿中可明顯辨識出的特殊風格或書寫手法。

attDef.desc: gives a standard name or other identifier for the scribe believed to be responsible for this hand.
提供被認定為負責該書寫手法的抄寫者名稱或其他識別符碼。
attDef.valDesc: Any name
任何名稱

attDef.desc: characterizes the particular script or writing style used by this hand, for example secretary, copperplate, Chancery, Italian, etc..
形容該書寫手法的特殊筆跡或書寫風格的特性，例如草書體大鉛字、銅版印刷、 法庭、或義大利文等。
describes the tint or type of ink, e.g. brown, or other writing medium, e.g. pencil
描述色料或墨水種類，例如棕色，或其他書寫媒介，例如鉛筆。
specifies how widely this hand is used in the manuscript.
指明該書寫手法在手稿中使用的範圍。

valItem.gloss: only this hand is used throughout the manuscript
手稿中完全使用此書寫手法
this hand is used through most of the manuscript
手稿中大部分使用此書寫手法
this hand is used occasionally in the manuscript
手稿中偶爾用此書寫手法

elementSpec.desc: contains description of type of musical notation.
包含樂譜種類的描述。
contains a description of the decoration of a manuscript, either as a sequence of paragraphs, or as a sequence of topically organised decoNote elements.
包含手稿的裝飾描述，可以是連續性的文字段落、或是一連串依主題排列的裝飾附註元素。
contains a note describing either a decorative component of a manuscript, or a fairly homogenous class of such components.
包含一個附註，描述手稿的裝飾性要素、或是該類要素的同等分類。
contains a description of any significant additions found within a manuscript, such as marginalia or other annotations.
包含手稿中任何重要增添文字的描述，例如旁註或其他註釋。
describes the present and former bindings of a manuscript, either as a series of paragraphs or as a series of distinct binding elements, one for each binding of the manuscript.
描述手稿現在與之前的裝訂，可以是連續性的文字段落、或是一連串專用的binding元素，每個手稿裝訂使用一個元素。
contains a description of one binding, i.e. type of covering, boards, etc. applied to a manuscript
一個裝訂的描述，例如使用於該手稿的封面類型、封面等。

attDef.desc: specifies whether or not the binding is contemporary with the majority of its contents
說明裝訂和其大部分內容是否出於同一時期。

elementSpec.desc: describes the seals or other external items attached to a manuscript, either as a series of paragraphs or as a series of distinct seal elements, possibly with additional decoNotes.
描述章印或其他附於手稿的外部項目，可以是連續性的文字段落、或是一連串專用的印章元素，也許附上一些裝飾附註元素。
contains a description of one seal or similar attachment applied to a manuscript
描述一個章印或其他附於手稿的類似項目

attDef.desc: specifies whether or not the seal is contemporary with the item to which it is affixed
說明該章印和其附著的項目是否出於同一時期。

elementSpec.desc: contains details of any significant additional material which may be closely associated with the manuscript being described, such as non-contemporaneous documents or fragments bound in with the manuscript at some earlier historical period.
包含可能與該手稿關係密切的重要附加資料之細節，例如非同時期的文件或是在早期與手稿裝訂一起的片段。
groups elements describing the full history of a manuscript or manuscript part.
匯集描述手稿或手稿部分完整歷史的元素。
contains any descriptive or other information concerning the origin of a manuscript or manuscript part.
包含關於手稿或手稿部分的來源之任何描述性或其他資訊。
contains any descriptive or other information concerning a single identifiable episode during the history of a manuscript or manuscript part, after its creation but before its acquisition.
包含任何描述性或其他資訊，關於手稿或手稿部分的歷史中單一可確認的事件，發生在手稿產生之後、取得之前。
contains any descriptive or other information concerning the process by which a manuscript or manuscript part entered the holding institution.
包含任何描述性或其他資訊，關於手稿或手稿部分進入保管機構的過程。
groups additional information, combining bibliographic information about a manuscript, or surrogate copies of it with curatorial or administrative information.
匯集附加資訊，結合手稿的書目資訊、或是手稿的代替副本，包含管理或行政資訊。
contains information about the present custody and availability of the manuscript, and also about the record description itself.
包含手稿現在的保管與可利用性資訊，也包含本身的紀錄描述。
provides information about the source and revision status of the parent manuscript description itself.
提供父手稿本身說明的出處與修訂狀態相關資訊。
describes the original source for the information contained with a manuscript description.
描述關於手稿說明資訊的原始出處。
contains a description of a manuscript's custodial history, either as running prose or as a series of dated custodial events.
包含手稿保管歷史的描述，可以是篇章、或是一連串註明日期的保管事件。
describes a single event during the custodial history of a manuscript.
描述手稿保管歷史中的單一事件。
contains information about any digital or photographic representations of the manuscript being described which may exist in the holding institution or elsewhere.
包含關於任何手稿的數位化或攝影呈現的資訊，可能存在於保管機構或是其他地方。
contains information about an originally distinct manuscript or part of a manuscript, now forming part of a composite manuscript.
包含原為單一、現為複合手稿一部份的手稿或手稿部分的相關資訊。
